item.title: Tacos
item.description: No me gusta comer tacos, son ineficientes y aburridos.

item.title: Cheaper to write software
item.description: It is definetly easier and cheaper to add some if statements to a program than physical functionality. Recently i’ve had to develop some software that needed to interface an Arduino, well it wasn’t originally like that. It was supposed to have some lcds and 8-segment displays which the arduino could drive and show temperature values via sensors. The problem was that I had to modify my whole plan because of the complexity involving electrical components, specially the LCD.
